data.subject: You're invited! {{recipient.name}}
data.body:
Dear {{recipient.name}}

You are invited to join us for our annual meeting. 

As part of our 10-year club, you are a valued part of our community and we hope to see you there.

data.label: Unsubscription Confirmation Template
data.description: This template is a concise confirmation email for users who unsubscribe from a newsletter, confirming their removal from the mailing list.
data.subject: Unsubscription Confirmation
data.body:
Hello {{recipient.name}},

This is to confirm that {{recipient.email}} has been unsubscribed from our monthly newsletter. You will no longer receive updates from us.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.
